user_query: I am planning a surprise party for my friend's birthday. Can you suggest some interesting birthday messages and provide me with the list of existing webhooks? Also, check my account balance and retrieve the history of message replies to ensure everything goes smoothly.

TaskList.description: Generate a list of interesting birthday messages that can be used for the party.
Retrieve the list of existing webhooks to ensure proper notifications during the party.
Check the account balance to make sure there are sufficient funds for party expenses.
Retrieve the history of message replies to check for any important communications related to the party.
